existing_features.title: Create a basic frontend home screen that welcomes the user and prompts them to define what kind of app they want to build (e.g., a short form with fields like “App idea”, “Target users”, and “Key features”), and display the entered text back on the page as a local preview (no persistence required).

Apply a coherent, distinct visual theme across the app (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) appropriate for a generic app builder welcome experience; avoid blue/purple as primary colors.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement a minimal backend canister endpoint that can be called from the frontend to verify connectivity (e.g., a query method returning a short English status string).

projectName: Initial app scaffold with welcome screen and project setup
